analysis.description:
Reentrancy in OpportyWhiteListHold.unlockTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#364-377):
	External calls:
	- OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[msg.sender].tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#371-373)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderList (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#373-374)

OpportyWhiteListHold.returnTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#359-364) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,nTokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#362-363)

OpportyWhiteListHold.unlockTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#364-377) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[msg.sender].tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#371-373)

OpportyWhiteList.getTokensBack (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#623-633) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#630-633)

Reentrancy in OpportyWhiteList.sendTokensToHold (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#612-623):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(getBalanceContract() >= tokenRaised) (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#615-616)
	- token.transfer(holdContract,tokenRaised) (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#616-623)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensTransferredToHold (/unique_chucks/18/0xe85083dec29ca5287a00a29f667a8c5489cdf297.sol#618-621)
